00031 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel) FloodPanelMap[]={
00032   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00033   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::onNotYetImplemented),
00034   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::ID_TEST_COMBO, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::onTestComboChanged),
00035   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::ID_RUN, RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::onRunClicked),
00036 
00037 };

00039 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel,FXPacker,FloodPanelMap,ARRAYNUMBER(FloodPanelMap));

00050 RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::
00051 FloodPanel(FXComposite *parent,FXuint opts, EnetFlooderClient* c)
00052   :FXPacker(parent, opts)
00053 {
00054 
00055   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this,
00056              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00057 
00058   // The help label
00059   FXString lab="The connection to the server is successfull. You can now "
00060     "choose flooding options.";
00061   FXLabel* labHelp=new FXLabel(root, lab);
00062 
00063   // The progress bar frame
00064   FXVerticalFrame *frProg = new FXVerticalFrame(root,
00065              LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00066   pgGlobal=new  FXProgressBar(frProg, this, ID_NYI, 
00067         PROGRESSBAR_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X|PROGRESSBAR_PERCENTAGE );
00068   pgGlobal->setTotal(5);
00069 
00070   pgStep=new  FXProgressBar(frProg, this, ID_NYI, 
00071         PROGRESSBAR_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X|PROGRESSBAR_PERCENTAGE );
00072   pgStep->setTotal(5);
00073 
00074   // The test combobox
00075   FXLabel* labTests=new FXLabel(frProg, "Available tests :");
00076   FXComboBox* cbTest=new FXComboBox(frProg, 0, this, ID_TEST_COMBO, 
00077                                     COMBOBOX_STATIC|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00078 
00079   cbTest->appendItem("All test - Perform all available tests (may be long)");
00080   cbTest->appendItem("---------------");
00081   cbTest->setNumVisible(5);
00082 
00083   // The buttons
00084   FXHorizontalFrame *frButtons = new FXHorizontalFrame(frProg,
00085              LAYOUT_FILL_X|PACK_UNIFORM_WIDTH);
00086   FXButton* btnRun=new FXButton(frButtons, "Flood", NULL, this, 
00087                                 ID_RUN, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_CENTER_X);
00088 
00089 
00090   // TestList
00091   testList=new tFlooderTestList();
00092   ftReliable* testReliable=new ftReliable();
00093   testList->push_back(testReliable);
00094 
00095   feedTestCombo(cbTest);
00096 }
00097 
00101 RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::~FloodPanel(){
00102   delete pgGlobal;
00103   delete pgStep;
00104 
00105   delete testList;
00106 }

00114   FXPacker::create();
00115   this->show();
00116 }

00129 long RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::
00130 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00131   LOGW("Not yet implemented");
00132   return 1;
00133 }
00134 
00140 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FloodPanel::feedTestCombo(FXComboBox* cb){
00141   LOGI("feedTestCombo called");
00142 
00143   tFlooderTestList::const_iterator iter;
00144   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00145   for (iter=testList->begin(); iter != testList->end(); iter++){
00146     LOGI("One etst found");
00147     FXString s;
00148     s=(*iter)->getName();
00149     s+=" (";
00150     s+=(*iter)->getDescription();
00151     s+=")";
00152     cb->appendItem(s);
00153   }
00154 }

00168   LOGI("onTestComboChanged called");
00169 }

00183   LOGI("onRunClicked called");
